title: Quarter-Season Awards Picks | Group Chat
description:
Justin, Tjarks, and Rob are joined by The Ringer’s Chris Ryan to discuss the top MVP candidates of the first quarter of the season. Later, Justin, Tjarks, and Rob look at Sixth Man of the Year, Defensive Player of the Year, and Most Improved (37:00).
Hosts: Justin Verrier, Jonathan Tjarks, and Rob Mahoney
Guest: Chris Ryan
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
